ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “I hear something's gonna fall
from the sky?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “You saved my life.
Not that I have much longer
to live anyway…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Everyone knows that accident
couldn't have been avoided.”{PAUSE}“But no one will be satisfied
until someone takes the blame.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “I want to leave
this garbage dump of a town behind me,
and start a new life.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “If I had a buggy,
I'd cross the southern desert,
and go to that town across the river…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “There was something glowing
in that well over there.”{PAUSE}“If I can get my hands on it,
I'm gonna sell it
and go to the Gold Saucer!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // “When I grow up,
I'm gonna travel the world
collecting glowing stones!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “I got it out of the well.
It must be a special rock!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “Hey?
You can't hold anymore.”{PAUSE}“I'll keep it in my pocket for you.
You can come by and pick it up later!”

dialogStrings:
“Everyone knows that accident
couldn't have been avoided.”{PAUSE}“But no one will be satisfied
until someone takes the blame.”

“I hear something's gonna fall
from the sky?”

“You saved my life.
Not that I have much longer
to live anyway…”

“I want to leave
this garbage dump of a town behind me,
and start a new life.”

“If I had a buggy,
I'd cross the southern desert,
and go to that town across the river…”

“There was something glowing
in that well over there.”{PAUSE}“If I can get my hands on it,
I'm gonna sell it
and go to the Gold Saucer!”

“When I grow up,
I'm gonna travel the world
collecting glowing stones!”

“I got it out of the well.
It must be a special rock!!”

“Hey?
You can't hold anymore.”{PAUSE}“I'll keep it in my pocket for you.
You can come by and pick it up later!”
